content:
IDesignerHostTransactionState Interface

Definition

Specifies methods for the designer host to report on the state of transactions.

In this Article

public interface IDesignerHostTransactionState

Remarks

The methods and properties exposed by the IDesignerHostTransactionState interface supplement those of the IDesignerHost interface.

Properties

IsClosingTransaction

Gets a value indicating whether the designer host is closing a transaction.

public bool IsClosingTransaction { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the designer is closing a transaction; otherwise, false.
